name: Referral Token
description: Put your referral token here. It's just your ID. Format: e.g: 365560315

name: Join PocketFi
description: Should the bot join PocketFi channel (for task claiming)?

name: Random sleep
description: Should the bot sleep randomly after each session? 5-30 seconds.

name: Check interval (seconds)
description: How often to login into accounts, in seconds.
